params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.linked_resource
params.description: The full name of the Google Cloud Platform resource the Data Catalog entry represents. For more information, see [Full Resource Name] (https://cloud.google.com/apis/design/resource_names#full_resource_name). Full names are case-sensitive. For example: //bigquery.googleapis.com/projects/{PROJECT_ID}/datasets/{DATASET_ID}/tables/{TABLE_ID} //pubsub.googleapis.com/projects/{PROJECT_ID}/topics/{TOPIC_ID}

params.name: data.sql_resource
params.description: The SQL name of the entry. SQL names are case-sensitive. Examples: pubsub.topic.{PROJECT_ID}.{TOPIC_ID} pubsub.topic.{PROJECT_ID}.`{TOPIC.ID.SEPARATED.WITH.DOTS}` bigquery.table.{PROJECT_ID}.{DATASET_ID}.{TABLE_ID} bigquery.dataset.{PROJECT_ID}.{DATASET_ID} datacatalog.entry.{PROJECT_ID}.{LOCATION_ID}.{ENTRY_GROUP_ID}.{ENTRY_ID} Identifiers (`_ID`) should comply with the [Lexical structure in Standard SQL] (https://cloud.google.com/bigquery/docs/reference/standard-sql/lexical).

params.name: data.fully_qualified_name
params.description: Fully qualified name (FQN) of the resource. FQNs take two forms: For non-regionalized resources: {SYSTEM}:{PROJECT}.{PATH_TO_RESOURCE_SEPARATED_WITH_DOTS} For regionalized resources: {SYSTEM}:{PROJECT}.{LOCATION_ID}.{PATH_TO_RESOURCE_SEPARATED_WITH_DOTS} Example for a DPMS table: dataproc_metastore:{PROJECT_ID}.{LOCATION_ID}.{INSTANCE_ID}.{DATABASE_ID}.{TABLE_ID}

methods.name: getLinkedResource
methods.description:
The full name of the Google Cloud Platform resource the Data Catalog entry represents. For more information, see [Full Resource Name] (https://cloud.google.com/apis/design/resource_names#full_resource_name).

Full names are case-sensitive. For example:

  • //bigquery.googleapis.com/projects/{PROJECT_ID}/datasets/{DATASET_ID}/tables/{TABLE_ID}
  • //pubsub.googleapis.com/projects/{PROJECT_ID}/topics/{TOPIC_ID}

Generated from protobuf field string linked_resource = 1;

params.name: var
params.description:
The full name of the Google Cloud Platform resource the Data Catalog entry represents. For more information, see [Full Resource Name] (https://cloud.google.com/apis/design/resource_names#full_resource_name).

Full names are case-sensitive. For example:

  • //bigquery.googleapis.com/projects/{PROJECT_ID}/datasets/{DATASET_ID}/tables/{TABLE_ID}
  • //pubsub.googleapis.com/projects/{PROJECT_ID}/topics/{TOPIC_ID}

methods.name: getSqlResource
methods.description:
The SQL name of the entry. SQL names are case-sensitive.

Examples:

  • pubsub.topic.{PROJECT_ID}.{TOPIC_ID}
  • pubsub.topic.{PROJECT_ID}.`{TOPIC.ID.SEPARATED.WITH.DOTS}`
  • bigquery.table.{PROJECT_ID}.{DATASET_ID}.{TABLE_ID}
  • bigquery.dataset.{PROJECT_ID}.{DATASET_ID}
  • datacatalog.entry.{PROJECT_ID}.{LOCATION_ID}.{ENTRY_GROUP_ID}.{ENTRY_ID} Identifiers (*_ID) should comply with the [Lexical structure in Standard SQL] (https://cloud.google.com/bigquery/docs/reference/standard-sql/lexical).

Generated from protobuf field string sql_resource = 3;

methods.name: getFullyQualifiedName
methods.description:
Fully qualified name (FQN) of the resource.

FQNs take two forms:

  • For non-regionalized resources: {SYSTEM}:{PROJECT}.{PATH_TO_RESOURCE_SEPARATED_WITH_DOTS}
  • For regionalized resources: {SYSTEM}:{PROJECT}.{LOCATION_ID}.{PATH_TO_RESOURCE_SEPARATED_WITH_DOTS} Example for a DPMS table: dataproc_metastore:{PROJECT_ID}.{LOCATION_ID}.{INSTANCE_ID}.{DATABASE_ID}.{TABLE_ID}

Generated from protobuf field string fully_qualified_name = 5;
